Text: Played this on my Android; love this game, I just finished level 100 first go, alot better on pc than android. Thanks azaq318, +1 worthy.
Enjoyed it as well :) Fun game :)
The .exe is corrupt when you double click to install it gives a bunch of ? (A lot of them) and if you install it won't work.
had a mouse lag problem. solved with plugging in gamepad (from steam forum). still a bit laggy though, feels like game with v-sync turned on
Works like a charm, thanks a lot azaq318. Been finding this full game since last month.
Unable to save progress.  That is frustrating!
